content.text: 基于NODE_ENV环境变量的开发模式标志。Development mode flag based on NODE_ENV environment variable. Can also be set using webpack.DefinePlugin for build-time optimization.

text.comment:
Const:

DEV

Description:

基于NODE_ENV环境变量的开发模式标志。Development mode flag based on NODE_ENV environment variable. Can also be set using webpack.DefinePlugin for build-time optimization.

Example:
// Conditional debugging
if (__DEV__) {
  console.log('Canvas debug info:', { width: canvas.width, height: canvas.height });
}
Example:

// Performance monitoring in development function drawChart(ctx, data) { const startTime = DEV ? performance.now() : 0;

// Chart drawing logic drawChartElements(ctx, data);

if (DEV) { const endTime = performance.now(); console.log(Chart render time: ${endTime - startTime}ms); } }

Since:

1.0.0
